channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
okay guys i made a server and all i did the tutorial on teenhut... but then when i run it this comes up
'java' is no recognized as an internal or exeternal file operable program or batch file help please? thank you
:confused:the confused :confused: pokemondner

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote author=Mod Franklin link=topic=401227.msg2973818#msg2973818 date=1254104008]
[center]This Tutorial Will show you how to fix “Path Specified” Problem.

Heres a Pic of the Error/Problem

[b]Step 1:

Okay Here Are The Steps To Fix Find Your Current Version Of JDK that you have heres mine.[/b]

Current Version Is JDK 1.6.0_14

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe

Step 2:

Click On Edit On your Compiler.

Step 3:
Change The JDK Version to your Version

Step 4:
SAVE IT!!!

RESULT:

Hope It Helps…

Read full topic
